aircraft.value: Heron Surveillance - AC-7013-834 at Zone-4 Facility

defect_observed.value: Battery thermal runaway indication. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Component fatigue due to operational stress cycles exceeding design limits

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Generator Control component. Analysis of operational data indicated parameter deviation.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 25/10/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 28/10/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 30/10/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 31/10/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 01/11/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
